name: Rando's Army
startIntroPart1: Hail, great Rando. Since you were a child your life had been fraught with hardships and unjustice, having grown up a underpriviliged orphan, abandoned twice by the people you looked up to, suffering gruesome facial mutilation at the end of another child's buzzsaw, and finally, rounding off your childhood at the time of the white flash, an event that caused the disappearence of all women, the collapse of society, and the slow, miserable end of humanity.
startIntroPart2: Oh King truly are you called 'Earth Shaker'! Your armies await your signal. Will you restore the glory of your empire? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: I'm s-sorry it's come to this...
attacked: P-Please... more deaths won't help anyone.
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [Land] units [in all non-occupied cities]

City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
When defeating a [Barbarian] unit, earn [2] Gold and recruit it
